title: #135: Lauryn's Time Management & Productivity Hacks
itunes:title: #135: Lauryn's Time Management & Productivity Hacks
description:
On this episode Lauryn is solo and talking time management and productivity hacks. She talks about the strategies she uses to manage her time so that she can maximize productivity. Lauryn also talks about how to use peel pads and optimize skin care.
